sourcesContent:
<template>
    <canvas ref="chart"></canvas>
  </template>
  
  <script>
  import { Chart } from 'chart.js/auto';
  
  export default {
    name: 'HotelChart',
    props: {
      chartData: {
        type: Object,
        required: true
      }
    },
    data() {
      return {
        chart: null
      }
    },
    watch: {
      chartData() {
        this.chart.data.datasets[0].data = this.chartData.datasets[0].data;
        this.chart.update();
      }
    },
    mounted() {
      const ctx = this.$refs.chart.getContext('2d');
      this.chart = new Chart(ctx, {
        type: 'line',
        data: this.chartData
      });
    }
  }
  </script>
